official_title: Planning Grant for Take Off Pounds Sensibly (TOPS) Classes for African American Breast Cancer Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* African American women diagnosed with breast cancer with BMI â‰¥ 25 kg/m2 after completion of primary therapy (surgery, radiation, adjuvant or neo-adjuvant chemotherapy).

Aim 2
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
Must have maximum age of 90 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Those whose oncology providers do not agree with their participation in a weight loss program
* History of Type II Diabetes Mellitus
* those participating in another weight loss program
* those taking a weight loss medication
* those without smart phones or internet connections or the ability to attend meetings via Zoom
